data.title: [Label] Fix distance map computation
data.body: **Problem:** Distance map was not computed correctly. Some characters were "cut" and were not shown properly. You can see a label displaying the problem in the image below (notice S, O, P and T characters for example): Here you can see the distance map texture generated for that text: You can see 2 problems in the generated texture: 1- The distance map spread added to each char glyph is greater below the glyph than above the glyph when it should be the same. 2- Glyphs are not fading out correctly producing hard edges instead of a smooth gradient. **Fixes:** - Commit ef6c5feb63d76bce3747c3b3582d8d6168a8b795 fixes the first problem. You can see in the generated texture how the spread now is equal below and above the glyph: - Commit 504b26834b8c354737b3f2349312c1663b3af325 fixes the second problem. It uses the same solution applied in [freetype-gl](https://github.com/rougier/freetype-gl). You can see in the generated texture how the hard edges disappear and now there is a smooth gradient. **Final result:**

data.title: [Android] Package Cocos2dx Game with Android Studio
data.body:
Can I package Cocos2dx game only use Android Studio? 
I upgrade my Android Studio and Android SDK yesterday, when I run cocos command, Android toolchains print an error, then quit. message here:
```tex
admindeMacBook-Pro-3:project_name admin$ cocos compile -p android --ap android-19 --android-studio
编译模式：debug
使用 Android Studio 工程：/Users/admin/Develop/project_name/proj.android-studio
正在执行：'/Users/admin/Library/Android/sdk/tools/android update project -t android-19 -p /Users/admin/Develop/project_name/proj.android-studio/app'

*************************************************************************
The "android" command is deprecated.
For manual SDK, AVD, and project management, please use Android Studio.
For command-line tools, use tools/bin/sdkmanager and tools/bin/avdmanager
*************************************************************************
Invalid or unsupported command "update project -t android-19 -p /Users/admin/Develop/project_name/proj.android-studio/app"

Supported commands are:
android list target
android list avd
android list device
android create avd
android move avd
android delete avd
android list sdk
android update sdk
执行命令出错，返回值：2。
```
I know revert my Android SDK is a practicable way. but I try to package Cocos2dx game only use Android Studio with JNI. Is anything possible for this mind? Have some guide to do this? thanks.
Maybe this is not the appropriate place I put this question, if so, I'm sorry about this.

data.title: [ci skip][AUTO]: updating luabinding & jsbinding & cocos_file.json automatically
[ci skip]fix some error for Android Studio project
data.body:
NDK_MODULE_PATH requires the path using`/` on Windows, or it may meet problem. For example, if i put engine into root of `c:`, it will not find some module path. Can refer to [this doc](https://chromium.googlesource.com/android_tools/+/master-backup/ndk/docs/IMPORT-MODULE.html#56) for detail information.

APP_SHORT_COMMANDS needs to be enabled, it is useful on Windows,  where the command line accepts a maximum of only of 8191 characters. More detail information can refer to [this doc](https://developer.android.com/ndk/guides/android_mk.html).

data.title: ui::Button 和ui::ImageView设置九宫格区域不正常的问题
data.body:
- cocos2d-x version:3.14.1
- devices test on:iphone6
重现场景，在创建一个ImageView并加载到屏幕上之后，点击一个按钮，更换这个ImageView的纹理，比如说从彩色的纹理换成黑白的纹理。会发现这个ImageView的九宫格拉伸出现了问题，是按照默认的九宫格区域拉伸的，而不是更换纹理之前的九宫格设定区域拉伸。
使用的是
ui::Button::loadTextures
ui::ImageVIew::loadTexture
这个两个api的进行纹理的更换。

data.title: download-deps.py needs to be fixed
data.body:
- cocos2d-x version: branch v3 v3.15

download-deps.py uses git to clean external folder, that is causing the error if git is not installed.

Please see http://discuss.cocos2d-x.org/t/android-ndk-jni-android-mk-cannot-find-module-with-tag-cocos-in-import-path/35287/36

data.title: Memory leak found in WebSocket.cpp
ETC1 images with alpha channel (2 textured) are rendered with artifacts.
data.body:
- cocos2d-x version: 3.14 and earlier
- devices test on: any
- developing environments
   - NDK version: any
   - VS version: any
   - browser type and version: any

Steps to Reproduce:

1.  Pack some image with alpha channel in two etc textures with RGB channels with premultiplied alpha and A channel
2.  Render it. You will see artifacts.

In the source code `Texture2D::setAlphaTexture`, line 1502:
`this->_hasPremultipliedAlpha = true; // PremultipliedAlpha should be true.`

In shader code ccShader_ETC1AS_PositionTextureColor.frag line 37:
`texColor.rgb *= texColor.a; // Premultiply with Alpha channel`

Need to choose something one.

data.title: [ci skip]fixed bug that toggle can not work at first time
AlphaFrame 默认值_alpha为255的BUG
data.body:
- cocos2d-x version:  3.12
- devices test on: all
- developing environments
   - NDK version:
   - Xcode version:
   - VS version:
   - browser type and version:

Steps to Reproduce:
龙骨动画dragonbones加载后，如果设置其透明度，则不会影响其子节点的透明度。我也设置了setCascadeOpacityEnabled(true),效果也是一样，没有任何反应。我追踪代码发现龙骨动画里面调用了AlphaFrame之后，AlphaFrame内部没有使用父节点的透明度，而是直接初始化为255，所以父节点的透明度影响不了子节点。

data.title: New Renderer Pipeline - Roadmap Status
Android application crash using the latest code -- EGL_BAD_ATTRIBUTE
data.body:
- cocos2d-x version: v3.15, git commit acc97516d8 plus patch #17641
- devices test on: LG G3 Stylus - Android 5.0.2
- developing environments
   - NDK version: r14b

Steps to Reproduce:

1. Create a new C++ project, compile for android and deploy to device:
 ````shell
cocos new -l cpp latesttest
cd latesttest
cocos run -p android --ap android-19 -m release -j`nproc` --ndk-toolchain arm-linux-androideabi-4.9
````
2. `adb logcat` will show the following error:
````
E/AndroidRuntime(22829): Process: org.cocos2dx.latesttest, PID: 22829
E/AndroidRuntime(22829): java.lang.RuntimeException: createContext failed: EGL_BAD_ATTRIBUTE
E/AndroidRuntime(22829): 	at android.opengl.GLSurfaceView$EglHelper.throwEglException(GLSurfaceView.java:1192)
E/AndroidRuntime(22829): 	at android.opengl.GLSurfaceView$EglHelper.throwEglException(GLSurfaceView.java:1183)
E/AndroidRuntime(22829): 	at android.opengl.GLSurfaceView$EglHelper.start(GLSurfaceView.java:1033)
E/AndroidRuntime(22829): 	at android.opengl.GLSurfaceView$GLThread.guardedRun(GLSurfaceView.java:1400)
E/AndroidRuntime(22829): 	at android.opengl.GLSurfaceView$GLThread.run(GLSurfaceView.java:1239)
D/Wear_Controller( 1847): Received broadcast action=android.intent.action.PACKAGE_ADDED and uri=org.cocos2dx.latesttest
W/ActivityManager(  732):   Force finishing activity org.cocos2dx.latesttest/org.cocos2dx.cpp.AppActivity
````
